she reminds me of admire vega from uma musume, so i like her a lot

For some reason, I like this ntr a lot more than most ntrs. Might be because the wife actually slaps him off initially and has to come back to the guy on her own after realizing her financial situation. Unlike most other doujins where the girl gets raped on the third page and is never able to even raise her voice against the rapist. Also helps that the editor didn't immediately creampie the wife and judging by the end, she still loves her husband and didn't fall for the editor's dick the second he penetrated her like every other ntr girl. Makes me even more excited for the second part to see those stuff happen, I just hope they TL it soon since the Japanese one has been on here for a few months now.
@Evollee vanilla? normall ntr? this typical gross ntr where girl forgot about darling and became sex addicted whore)
that's the most normal ntr i've seen

NTR doujins has honestly twisted my views on Japanese people. I know it’s fictional but I genuinely don’t know if Japanese people are this stupid. Like how the fuck do you not check on a bank / savings accounts for YEARS.
